name: Pixel Skater Dude
description:
A simple skateboarding game made with Gameboy spec's. Very much a prototype but playable.

Controls
========

"W"- Up
"S" - Down
"A" - Brakes
"J" - Jump

Created for a game jam but is mostly a prototype.

Music
======
freesound.org - edtijo - Happy 8bit Pixel Adenture.wav
